Package Management

Class ProblemSupervisor

java.lang.Object
Management.ProblemSupervisor
public class ProblemSupervisor extends Object
A problem supervisor solves a single problem by using several cooperating solvers in parallel threads. Created by ohlbach on 09.10.2018.

    • generateProblem

      public boolean generateProblem(Monitor errorMonitor, Monitor warningMonitor)
      reads or generates the SAT-clauses
      Returns:
      true if method succeeded, false if an error has occurred

    • finished

      public void finished(Solver solver, Result result, String message)
      This method is called by the solvers to indicate that they have done their job or gave up. If the solver succeeded (satisfiable or unsatisfiable) then all other solvers are interrupted.
      Some messages are logged.
      Parameters:
      solver - which finished its work.
      result - the result of the solver's work.
      message - an extra message to explain the result.

    • collectStatistics

      public Statistic[] collectStatistics()
      The method collects the individual solver statistics into an array of Statistic-objects: statistics[0] = supervisor statistics
      statistics[1...] = solver statistics
      Returns:
      the array of Statistics objects.

    • reportResult

      public void reportResult(PrintStream out)
      prints the result to the PrintStream
      Parameters:
      out - a PrintStream

    • announceResult

      public void announceResult(Result unsatisfiable, String source)
